'Leaving' (Czech - 'OdchÃ¡zenÃ­') is a 2007 tragicomedic play by VÃ¡clav Havel.

Although Havel has had an extensive career as a playwright, Leaving was his
first play in over twenty years. The play premiered at Archa Theatre
in Prague on May 22, 2008. The play is composed of five acts and
requires eleven men, six women, and one voice. In 2011, Havel
directed a film adaptation of his play.
